Document.Focus: Make the most of your doctor visit

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Make the most of your doctor visit
QAPair.Answer: A visit with your health care provider is a good time to share health concerns and ask questions. Preparing ahead for your appointment can help you get the most from your time together. When you see your provider, be honest about your symptoms and lifestyle habits . Ask questions to make sure you understand. Taking an active role in your health can help you get the best care possible.
